\begin{equation}
L_{\alpha}{}^{\beta}=2 X^{\beta\gamma}\frac{\partial}{\partial
X^{\alpha\gamma}}-\frac{2}{M} \delta_{\al}{}^{\beta}X^{\beta\gamma}\frac{\partial}{\partial
X^{\beta\gamma}} \,,\qquad D=X^{\beta\gamma}\frac{\partial}{\partial
X^{\beta\gamma}}\,,
\

\begin{equation}
\label{gego} \omega^{\al\beta}=2\lambda^{2}dX^{\rho\sigma}\Big
(\frac{1}{1-\lambda^{2}f^{2}}\Big )^{\al\gamma}\Big (\frac{\partial
f_{\gamma}{}^{\mu}}{\partial X^{\rho\sigma}} f_{\mu}{}^{\lambda}-
f_{\gamma}{}^{\mu}\frac{\partial f_{\mu}{}^{\lambda}}{\partial X^{\rho\sigma}}\Big )
\Big (\frac{1}{1-\lambda^{2}f^{2}}\Big )_{\lambda}{}^{\beta}\,.
\

\begin{equation}
\label{map} sh \frac{\lambda X}{2} = \frac{\lambda
f(\tilde{X})}{\sqrt{1-\lambda^2 f^2(\tilde{X})}}\,,\qquad ch
\frac{\lambda X}{2} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\lambda^2
f^2(\tilde{X})}}\,.
\

\begin{equation}
h_{AB}=\frac{1}{4}\int\limits_{-1}^{1}\exp(\lambda X t)_{A}{}^{C} \delta
X_{C}{}^{D}\exp(\lambda X t)_{DB} dt
\
